pkgmetadata.longdescription: # TrenchrunThis tool computes the [Meridian TrenchRun](https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Meridian_trench) image for a scene using[Whitebox Tools](https://github.com/jblindsay/whitebox-tools/),[PDAL](https://pdal.io), and matplotlib.![Meridian Trench](/images/meridian.png)![Autzen Trenchrun Image](/images/autzen-exposure.jpg)
